title: Occupational Health Practice
description:
This module focuses on knowledge and competencies of occupational health (OH) professionals to manage Occupational Health services and programs e.g. implementing integrated management systems, planning of health promotion programmes, calculating cost and benefits of programs.

It addresses practical challenges of OH professionals who work in a business environment by stressing their contributions to the overall business processes and goals, its operations and the health of its employees.

Students will have opportunities to gain practical skills for translating their occupational health knowledge into practical applications such as program development, designing interventions and programme monitoring.
department: SSH School of Public Health Dean's Office
